channel.title: Funpk
channel.description: Ok I added FunPK into my server, and when I go into the area of it, it says wild lvl -44. But if i try to attack anyone, even my own levels it sends a message saying that the combat level difference is to high...?

item.title: Funpk
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Most servers just do
if (absX > 1000 && absX < 1500) {
absX -= 1000;
WildLevel = (absX / 6);
}

Pretty simple.

Read full topic

item.title: Funpk
item.dc:creator: @Mental_Piracy Mental Piracy
item.description:
@Mental_Piracy wrote:

most servers have the wild done in a grid format, with certain points meaning a new wild level, and others meaning multi or single.

I am guessing you added your fun pkbox to your wild method, within that method is some code for finding and displaying the correct wild level. Since your pkbox isnt in the wild, it wont have a correct number.

Fixes would be to either edit your wilderness method to fix, or the easier choice of leaving your funpk separate(its own area finding method, own spot in your death method, etc). Not seeing your code, thats as in depth as I can go.

Read full topic

item.title: Funpk
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

You must have added the wrong wild level. The highest is 52 i guess? :l Anyways, PI or Delta?

Read full topic
